modName: Rings of Light Enchantment - Dungeon Gear-Pack 1
summary: This sets seven different kinds of light Enchantments in Skyrim. They originate in rings. These rings will emit a area of light, without glow unless you are in fog or smoke. These enchantments can be taken and used for other objects as you see fit, restricted to jewelry and head gear of course.  It is known that the Riverwood Trader usually carries
descriptionHtml:
These rings can be worn and will emit a light effect lighting up the area. There are seven total different kinds of light, each an individual enchantment. 

No known issues, but I\'m continuing to keep an eye on things as they come up.

This works great with the Darker Dungeons, and Lightless Abandon Dungeons mod.

The file is named \'DungeonGear01\' because I am working on a slew of different kinds of gear specifically used for dungeons, especially lightless and dark dungeons.
author: Marbaus

files.name: Rings of Light Enchantment - Dungeon Gear Pack 1
